dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HR 3880 IH: National Security Agency Data Collection Review Act of 2014
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carney (for himself, Ms. Hanabusa, and Mr. Connolly) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Select Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To provide for the expiration of certain provisions of the USA PATRIOT Act and the FISA Amendments Act of 2008 on December 31, 2014.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Security Agency Data Collection Review Act of 2014.

section.header: Sunset of certain provisions of the USA PATRIOT Act and the FISA Amendments Act of 2008

subsection.text: Section 102(b)(1) of the USA PATRIOT Improvement and Reauthorization Act of 2005 (Public Law 109–177; 50 U.S.C. 1805 note, 50 U.S.C. 1861 note, and 50 U.S.C. 1862 note) is amended by striking June 1, 2015 and inserting December 31, 2014.

paragraph.text: Section 403(b) of the FISA Amendments Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–261; 50 U.S.C. 1801 note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1), by striking December 31, 2017 and inserting December 31, 2014; and
in paragraph (2) in the material preceding subparagraph (A), by striking December 31, 2017 and inserting December 31, 2014.

paragraph.text: The heading of section 404(b)(1) of the FISA Amendments Act of 2008 (Public Law 110–261; 50 U.S.C. 1801 note) is amended by striking December 31, 2017 and inserting December 31, 2014.
